short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search site for specified text, and get notified when it is found in the content of a page (displayed on the top of the page)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search any page automatically when it loads and get notified if the search terms were found in the current page.
